name: Skeletal Defender: Dungeon Siege
description:
As the skeletal defender of your dungeon, you must fend off an endless stream of daring adventurers who seek to claim your home for themselves. Armed with your magical deck of cards, you'll need to use all your skills to beat back wave after wave of foes and emerge victorious.

Currently, there are only 4 cards that you can use.

Controls:

[Left Click] Select Cards

[Enter/Return] Needed for UI

[Escape] Pause Game

Credits for Skeletal Defender:

Art & Programming: borboss

Art: jayjobbojbob

Fonts:

  • dtinth: Comic Mono (Link)
I'm aware this game has quite a bit of balancing issues, and this was my first project in Rust, and by extension Bevy. This was definitely an incredibly educational and enjoyable experience, and would recommend anyone who has the ability to, to try and learn some Rust and Bevy themselves.
